input.sentences: which of these items should be removed
so many items to choose from to remove
i am still kind of feeling this one
but these have got to go
output.sentences: A man looked around his living room and decided it was time for him to redecorate.
He removed some items, included some antique vases.
He regarded his desk and really wanted to declutter so he removed old files that weren't necessary.
He began to throw his items away, but changed his mind about one of his red vases.
He used the papers from his desk and crafted up some flowers to add it into the vase.
